Blake D. Mills IV

Objective

I am a senior software developer seeking a position starting in mid-September. I have been doing Agile development for over ten years and am a believer in TDD, short iterations, pairing, refactoring, and continuous deployment. I have used a wide range of technologies and have been building large-scale web products since I created the first online calendar as a collegiate side project back in 1997.
